title: Guild

fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
- Factional chat and kill
- Consists of 4 players, only one of which will be Finance
- Has a factional resource called “Profit” which starts at 0
- Each role has an associated “Item” (they do not start with this item)
- Can vote to skip the factional kill to instead open a shop. The host rolls 3 random Guild roles, and their associated items become available for purchase that night. Items do not deplete once purchased.
- The Guild immediately loses if they begin the night in debt.
- If the day ends without a Guild member being hanged, they gain 1 Profit.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all good players (for the sake of shareholders).

desc: *The real evil was capitalism all along.*
